main event: On July 7, 1967, a resident of Appleton, Wisconsin reported sighting an unidentified flying object that appeared yellow and was estimated to be between 1 to 15 feet in diameter.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like 'two bowls put together',It hovered approximately 1,000 feet above ground and made no sound,The sighting lasted about 5-10 seconds,The object was confirmed as a hoax according to the analysis,This sighting included a letter reporting extreme speed and a lack of sound.
sighted object: yellow object resembling two bowls put together
witness description: The observer reported a yellow object that hovered without sound.
